subclassFeatures.name: Devotee of Eilistraee
entries: Followers of The Dark Maiden combine their talents of music and performance with Eilistraee's blessings on their allies, inspiring courage and repelling darker forces.

entries.name: Mantle of Inspiration
entries: As a musically talented devotee of Eilistraee, at 3rd level you gain the ability to weave a song of magic that imbues your allies with vigor and speed.

As a bonus action, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration to grant yourself a wondrous appearance. When you do so, choose a number of creatures you can see and that can see you within 60 feet of you, up to a number equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one). Each of them gains 5 temporary hit points. When a creature gains these temporary hit points, it can immediately use its reaction to move up to its speed, without provoking opportunity attacks.
The number of temporary hit points increases when you reach certain levels in this class, increasing to 8 at 5th level, 11 at 10th level, and 14 at 15th level.

entries.name: Song of Transfixion
entries: By using your skills with song, you channel Eilistraee's will of protection in order to buy valuable time for allies in a dangerous situation.
Choose an enemy within 15 feet of you or an ally - it must succeed on a Wisdom save against your spell save DC or be stunned (incapacitated) until the end of its next turn, or until it takes damage.
You may use this ability once per short rest.
